citations.narrative:
Food supplies need to be stored adequately. Two open bags of dry feed (one bag of kangaroo feed and one bag of dog
food) were stored in the barn. Flies were noted on the inside top of one of the open bags. Lettuce and carrots were stored
on top of a lidded can in the same area and were not refrigerated. Temperatures later today are projected to be in the
80's.
Food needs to be stored adequately and perishable food needs to be refrigerated to protect the feed supplies from
deterioration, molding and contamination by vermin. All supplies of food shall be stored in facilities which adequately
protect such supplies. Correct by 5/18/24.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.125(c) 
   
Facilities, general. 
Food supplies need to be stored adequately. Two open bags of dry feed (one bag of kangaroo feed and one bag of dog 
food) were stored in the barn. Flies were noted on the inside top of one of the open bags. Lettuce and carrots were stored 
on top of a lidded can in the same area and were not refrigerated. Temperatures later today are projected to be in the 
80's.  
Food needs to be stored adequately and perishable food needs to be refrigerated to protect the feed supplies from 
deterioration, molding and contamination by vermin. All supplies of food shall be stored in facilities which adequately 
protect such supplies. Correct by 5/18/24. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
